original_text: When they went, they went in any of their four directions without turning as they went, but in whatever direction the front wheel faced, the others followed without turning as they went.
korean_text: 그룹들이 나아갈 때에는 사방으로 몸을 돌리지 아니하고 나아가되 몸을 돌리지 아니하고 그 머리 향한 곳으로 나아가며

sentences.original_text: they went in any of their four directions
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 방향 중 어느 방향으로든 갔으며

sentences.original_text: but in whatever direction the front wheel faced
